body_html:
Hello!
I am getting the same error. In my code I basically put names of images in a FIFO, then read images,randomly cropped them and pass the result to a tf.train.batch with 3 or more threads.

When I remove the random_crop the error doesn't occur.
When I use 1 or 2 threads, the error occur time to time and always with more.
When I run it in gdb I get the same backtrace.
`

body:
Hello! 
I am getting the same error. In my code I basically put names of images in a FIFO, then read images,randomly cropped them and pass the result to a tf.train.batch with 3 or more threads.

When I remove the random_crop the error doesn't occur.
When I use 1 or 2 threads, the error occur time to time and always with more.
When I run it in gdb I get  the same backtrace.
`
